content: Set terminal title: echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Macro-based consistent naming migration\007"
MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Phase 1: Add paste = "1.0" to Cargo.toml dependencies
Phase 1: Add the define_method macro to tools.rs
Phase 1: Build and fix any compile errors and warnings (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Phase 2: Rename help files in brp_tools/ - brp_*.txt to bevy_*.txt for Bevy protocol methods
Phase 2: Rename watch-related files - bevy_stop_watch.txt to brp_stop_watch.txt, bevy_list_active_watches.txt to brp_list_active_watches.txt
Phase 2: Rename app_tools files - add brp_ prefix to all files
Phase 2: Rename log_tools files - add brp_ prefix to all files
Phase 2: Build and fix any compile errors and warnings
Phase 3: Replace Bevy protocol method constants with macro invocations
Phase 3: Replace BRP extras method constants with macro invocations
Phase 3: Replace BRP internal tool constants with macro invocations
Phase 3: Replace app tool constants with macro invocations
Phase 3: Replace log tool constants with macro invocations
Phase 3: Add special case for rpc.discover
Phase 3: Remove old constant definitions and old with_prefix macro
Phase 3: Build and fix any compile errors and warnings
Phase 4: Update code references - fix TOOL_CLEANUP_LOGS to TOOL_BRP_CLEANUP_LOGS
Phase 4: Update code references - fix TOOL_LIST_LOGS to TOOL_BRP_LIST_LOGS
Phase 4: Update code references - fix TOOL_READ_LOG to TOOL_BRP_READ_LOG
Phase 4: Update code references - fix TOOL_BRP_STOP_WATCH underscore issue
Phase 4: Update code references - fix TOOL_BRP_LIST_ACTIVE_WATCHES underscore issue
Phase 4: Build and fix any compile errors and warnings
Run cargo clippy with strict settings and fix all issues (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run - STOP if test issues
CodeReview: Task subagent to review changes for duplication and complexity (read-only)
CodeReview: Review suggested changes with user
